extDesc.message: Provides integration with CENO and Ouinet: page caching and grouping, page source information, settings and other functionality. Includes code from Localizer by rugk under MIT license.

settingsWarn.message: Settings on this page are only intended for testing CENO functionality in various network conditions. These are $NOT_SAVED$ when stopping CENO. See the $MANUAL$ for more information.

settingsWarnManLN.description: Link to the Settings section of the User Manual. Do not translate unless the section has been translated.
